name: RE:RE:RUN
description: Inspired by Dani's work, I made a mod for Re:Run. This mod changes a few things such as right click to throw, shift to block, alt to slow time, new death callouts, and no blood particles. (To be kid-friendly and make the game run smoother.) But the major change is if you complete level 10 in under 20 seconds you unlock, a unused asset, a gun! One shot kills, janky aiming, and dual wielding of a gun and a sword is all now possible. Remember, was the gun was cut from the game. To use the gun, pick up a sword powerup.
